text: Kevin Christian Trapp (, born 8 July 1990) is a German footballer. He plays as a goalkeeper for the Bundesliga club Eintracht Frankfurt and the Germany national team. He began his career at 1. FC Kaiserslautern where he played in two Bundesliga seasons. He signed for Eintracht Frankfurt for a fee of €1.5 million in 2012. He played regularly for 3 years, also playing in the UEFA Europa League. He joined Paris Saint-Germain F.C. for €10 million in 2015 where he won many national honors. In 2018, He rejoined Eintracht Frankfurt on loan and then was signed permanently the next season. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals 1\.
